title: 08/17/2021 - HOUR 3 - Seahawks, backup QBs
itunes:title: 08/17/2021 - HOUR 3 - Seahawks, backup QBs
description:
The Seahawks and Jamal Adams agree on a four year $70 million extension

Colin tries to name the backup QB of NFL teams


Guest: Drew Bledsoe

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
